channel.title: Found what is casuing lag/low framerate
channel.description:
Its the high dynamic range lighting option. Disable and its fine but any other option causing lag/low framerate. Seeing that this game can only run on 1 core when this happens core 1 usage skyrockets
any idea on how to fix Game looks so much better with it on
my specs are fine 980X4.6 2 gtx 480
